transcript: when I make bets I like to choose really high probability bets that I think I can 10x and that is again my investment style Venture Capital will take 50 bets that are very small hoping for 100x pays for the whole portfolio where everyone else pretty much loses money right and so I have a different style our style is we want to win on everyone and I'm okay just hitting 10 X's across the board ideally not having any zero X's it's just a different investment thesis
